alert.note: Alert for Clark; Fayette; Greene; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:56AM EDT until July 29 at 5:45AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fayette County in central Ohio... Southern Clark County in west central Ohio... Greene County in west central Ohio... Southwestern Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 545 AM EDT. * At 456 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Yellow Springs, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Kettering, Beavercreek, Fairborn, Xenia, Bellbrook, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, Cedarville, Enon, Jamestown, South Charleston, Jeffersonville, Wilberforce, Riverside, Harmony, Lisbon, New Jasper, Spring Valley and South Vienna. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 44 and 67. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 58 and 74. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
